*Analysis*

-   Filter data

```{r eval = FALSE}
filtered_data = ds_patches %>%
  filter(
    metaecosystem == "no",
    time_point >= first_time_point_model,
    time_point <= last_time_point_model
  )
```

-   Full model

```{r eval = FALSE}
full_model = lmer(
  shannon ~
    day +
    patch_size_ml +
    patch_size_ml : day +
    baseline_shannon + 
    baseline_shannon : day +
    (day | culture_ID),
  data = filtered_data,
  REML = FALSE,
  control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
)

summary(full_model)
plot(full_model)
qqnorm(resid(full_model))
```

-   ...

```{r eval = FALSE}
null_model = lmer(
  shannon ~
    day +
    patch_size_ml : day +
    baseline_shannon + 
    baseline_shannon : day +
    (day | culture_ID),
  data = filtered_data,
  REML = FALSE,
  control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
)

summary(null_model)
plot(null_model)
qqnorm(resid(null_model))
stats = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                            null_model,
                            "mixed_model")

stats
```
